Headline: #115 Pullman/115th Temporary Reroute at 115th/State
ShortDescription: 115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted via 115th, State, 111th, Wentworth, and 115th, due to street blockage near 115th/State.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 115th, State, 111th, Wentworth, and 115th, due to street blockage near 115th/State.

Allow extra travel time.
